subject: thank you notes (s)
body:
I'm thankful [Kadhja Bonet's voice](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0IS1RbHjZso) exists, even when everything has lost it, her voice is still delicious to me. That and white chocolate buttons. And human resilience and people who laugh at themselves.

\- S (08/24/2016).
normalized_markdown:

\- S (08/24/2016).
